snippet: The New York Times Test Infrastructure Development team has been working on a reporting system with a new front end to present results for our functional test suites. We’ve decided to open source our projects as we continue to work on them.
abstract: The New York Times Test Infrastructure Development team has been working on a reporting system with a new front end to present results for our functional test suites. We’ve decided to open source our projects as we continue to work on them.

headline.main: Improving the User Experience of Automated Integration Testing
